channel.title: Looking for that one coder? you found him
channel.description:
I have created my server, chillaxscape, was a great server but people just so happened to ruin it. So now i'm going to sell it and help people code there server. I'm looking for a pair team, me and someone else. I will help them with just about everything. If you have any questions, contact me at robbing_mexican@hotmail.com i'm on just about 24\7 ( no i'm not a computer nerd it's just spring break for me and I thought i would help people )
Reason why i'm so good at coding 1. I have learned alot from other players so my brain power on coding has increased drastically 2. I have helped other people with there servers and now it's come out to be great 3. I can also make banners and websites ( I don't really know how that's coding LAWL but o well). 4. I'm AMAZING =P
So add me right now and we can get to work on creating something brilliant.
P.S - If interested in buying my server I have removed alot of things but it is still a great server. Tons of commands, good shops and other things as well. Add me on my msn if interested in that as well =)
Thank you, Flame!

item.title: Looking for that one coder? you found him
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

ThatOneServer is That One Coder?.. Jk… i dont want to help, but heres my opinion. Its not fun to code with somebody else… like coding a server with somebody else. They can make an edit at the same time as you, and now one of you have to code again.

Read full topic
